title: Emily Ratajkowski bundles up for fall as she heads out on a walk with her suitcase in tow
text:
It's fall, and Emily Ratajkowski appears to be loving every minute of it.

On Monday, the supermodel stepped out appearing to be headed somewhere else as she rolled her Away suitcase while taking her dog Colombo on a quick walk.

The 28-year-old looked stylish as she strutted the city sidewalks looking as if she just stepped off the runway before her upcoming travel plans.

On-the-go: Emily Ratajkowski stepped out appearing to be headed somewhere else as she rolled her Away suitcase while taking her dog Colombo on a quick walk

For the outing she wore a tan trench coat that she had tied around her toned waist.

Underneath she wore a plain black top and a pair of comfy black pants and white sneakers.

She had her hair up in a bun while wearing a pair of sleek black sunglasses.

Gotta run: The 28-year-old looked stylish as she strutted the city sidewalks looking as if she just stepped off the runway before her upcoming travel plans

Emily has been nailing the fall fashion look lately and even took to her Instagram over the weekend to pat herself on the back.

The photo showed herself wearing an oversized blazer with a zebra print belt clipped around her waist while she walked next to her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard in a black jacket.

'How our family does fall,' she said alongside the photo.

Fall family: Emily and her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard show the city of New York just how they do fall fashion; pictured on Saturday in NYC

Emily and her husband got married back in February of last year.

The two exchanged their vows in a courthouse wedding in New York City with just a few of their close friends in attendance.

Their marriage comes just after two weeks of dating after being spotted together on Valentine's Day following her split with her ex boyfriend Jeff Magid just weeks before.
description:
It's fall, and Emily Ratajkowski appears to be loving every minute of it.
On Monday, the supermodel stepped out appearing to be headed somewhere else as she rolled her Away suitcase.
